feed.title: Google Cloud: Audit Manager
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Audit Manager

entry.content: Audit Manager lets you download Google Cloud compliance documents. You can use these documents to better understand how Google addresses its responsibilities to meet the requirements of various regulatory frameworks.
entry.summary: Audit Manager now allows you to download Google Cloud compliance documents. These documents help you understand how Google meets regulatory framework requirements.
entry.title: Feature: Compliance Documents Now Available
